stories.title: Fix About page technical white paper section and staff data
stories.description: The About page has a placeholder 'Technical white paper here' section (around line 182-192 in about-page.tsx) and all 10 staff rows show identical 'CTO' roles. Read the Figma design at https://www.figma.com/design/JeBNlyIXgrcyQ1rwyfpebB/Bilby?node-id=3463-1194 for the About page, then: 1) Replace the technical white paper placeholder with the actual design from Figma (or remove if not in design), 2) Update staff roles and names to match Figma exactly, 3) Ensure spacing, typography, and layout match the Figma design. Use the Figma MCP tool (get_design_context with fileKey JeBNlyIXgrcyQ1rwyfpebB) to read the actual design. Follow React best practices — extract reusable components if sections repeat patterns.
acceptance_criteria: Technical white paper placeholder is replaced with actual content from Figma or removed
Staff section shows correct varied roles and names matching Figma
Typography classes match Figma design (font sizes, weights, spacing)

stories.title: Cross-check Home and Platform pages against Figma design for visual accuracy
stories.description: Using Figma MCP (get_design_context with fileKey JeBNlyIXgrcyQ1rwyfpebB), cross-check the Home page and Platform page against the Figma design. Focus on: 1) Hero section typography, spacing, and button styles, 2) Section padding and margins between blocks, 3) Color values matching CSS custom properties, 4) Card layouts and grid alignment, 5) Footer navigation layout accuracy. Fix any discrepancies found. Take a browser screenshot after changes to verify visually. Follow React best practices — use cn() for conditional classes, semantic HTML, and keep components under 200 lines.
